timeline.bodyText: No jetbrains Nullable :-), this is an AndroidStudio trick where it pulls in jetbrains annotation before android annotation, might be a preference somewhere so it never does it
timeline.author: mikehardy

replies.bodyText:
On the plus side the lint check did fail it so it was noted automatically :-)

  /home/runner/work/Anki-Android/Anki-Android/AnkiDroid/src/main/java/com/ichi2/anki/ModelFieldEditor.java:48: Error: Use androidx.annotation.NonNull and androidx.annotation.Nullable. See explanation for IDE-level fix [InconsistentAnnotationUsage]
  import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
replies.author: mikehardy

replies.bodyText:
Automation is awesome - The Android Studio explanation shows:

  
    
      Anki-Android/lint-rules/src/main/java/com/ichi2/anki/lint/rules/InconsistentAnnotationUsage.java
    
    
        Lines 37 to 38
      in
      1f785c1
    
    
    
    

        
          
           private static final String EXPLANATION = "AnkiDroid uses androidx nullability annotations over JetBrains for nullability. " + 
        

        
          
                   "The annotations library can be specified in Settings - Inspections - @NotNull/@Nullable problems";
replies.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText: I do love externalizing memory, that is a fantastic error message haha
replies.author: mikehardy
